Uses of Interface
com.linecorp.armeria.server.Service

  • Packages that use Service 
    Package Description
    com.linecorp.armeria.server
    Server core.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.composition
    Service composition.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.docs
    Documentation service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http
    HTTP service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.file
    HTTP static file service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.healthcheck
    Health check service for load balancers.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.jetty
    Embedded Jetty service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.tomcat
    Embedded Tomcat service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.logging
    Logging and metric-collecting decorator services.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift
    Thrift service.
    com.linecorp.armeria.server.tracing
    Provides distributed tracing decorators for armeria services using Brave, a Java tracing library compatible with Zipkin.

      HttpService HttpFileService.orElse(Service<?,? extends HttpResponse> nextService)
      Creates a new HttpService that tries this HttpFileService first and then the specified HttpService when this HttpFileService does not have a requested resource.

    • Uses of Service in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.healthcheck

      Classes in com.linecorp.armeria.server.http.healthcheck that implement Service 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HttpHealthCheckService
      An HttpService that responds with HTTP status "200 OK" if the server is healthy and can accept requests and HTTP status "503 Service Not Available" if the server is unhealthy and cannot accept requests.

      An HttpService that dispatches its requests to a web application running in an embedded Jetty.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ThriftCallService
      A Service that handles a ThriftCall.
      class  ThriftService
      Deprecated. 
      Use THttpService instead.
      class  THttpService
      A Service that handles a Thrift call.
      Methods in com.linecorp.armeria.server.thrift that return types with arguments of type Service 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Function<Service<ThriftCall,ThriftReply>,THttpService> THttpService.newDecorator()
      Creates a new decorator that supports all thrift protocols and defaults to TBinary protocol when the client doesn't specify one.
      static Function<Service<ThriftCall,ThriftReply>,THttpService> THttpService.newDecorator(SerializationFormat defaultSerializationFormat)
      Creates a new decorator that supports all thrift protocols and defaults to the specified defaultSerializationFormat when the client doesn't specify one.
      static Function<Service<ThriftCall,ThriftReply>,THttpService> THttpService.newDecorator(SerializationFormat defaultSerializationFormat, Iterable<SerializationFormat> otherAllowedSerializationFormats)
      Creates a new decorator that supports the protocols specified in allowedSerializationFormats and defaults to the specified defaultSerializationFormat when the client doesn't specify one.
      static Function<Service<ThriftCall,ThriftReply>,THttpService> THttpService.newDecorator(SerializationFormat defaultSerializationFormat, SerializationFormat... otherAllowedSerializationFormats)
      Creates a new decorator that supports only the formats specified and defaults to the specified defaultSerializationFormat when the client doesn't specify one.
